Create Segments List (Parallel Version)

Source: R/parallel_moneca.R
create.segments.parallel.Rd

Helper function to create the segment list structure that matches the original moneca output. This replicates the create.segments function from the original moneca.

Usage

create.segments.parallel(out.put, mx, segment.levels)

Arguments

out.put

List of segmentation results from each level

mx

Original mobility matrix

actual.levels

Number of levels actually computed

Value

List of segment memberships for each hierarchical level

On this page
